Name: Romancing The Kingdom
About the game: This graphical novel starts in the kingdom of the Amazons, introducing the heiress to the throne and her companion who are heading towards the annual Spring Celebration. Court intrigue and the politics of succession weigh heavily on Princess Polly, but she meets with friends and makes a new friend along the way to the castle. Captain Jack is quite the scandalous man, but he might not be a match for the Amazons. Choose dozens of paths and save your progress along the way. Unlock graphic erotic scenes that you can return to from the start menu. Go at your own pace or skip through dialogue quickly. Your choices will effect the outcomes, so choose wisely but you can always try again later. Features: - Over 2,600 renders - Thousands of lines of dialogue - Multiple story paths - Explicit simulated sex scenes (NSFW) - Many hours of playtime - Dozens of characters and relationship outcomes - Mouse or keyboard control
